1.content:
Roster:
Singles Wrestlers:

Duke Lundi – The current World Champion of the TFF, Lundi uses the powers he gains from his black feather talisman to take control of his opponent’s bodies, forcing them into submission. The man from Haiti has proven undefeatable so far, could that change?

Himiko – The TFF’s National Champion, hailing from deep within Japan. Her use of questionable tactics have proven to be effective, but cost her the support of the fans and her alleged cheating can only go so far before it backfires…
Rebecca Ware – The member of the roster with the worst win-loss record in the company’s history, Rebecca Ware looks to change all this, few others are convinced this’ll happen.

Sergeant Brutus Ality – A former cop who was kicked off the force, Brutus loves to dish out the tickle torture with his custom tazer. With his own brand of justice, the former policeman dishes out hard time on everyone that crosses his path.
Wheelz – A biker who thinks himself a tough guy, Wheelz has yet to gain any sort of momentum within the TFF, his long running feud with Sergeant Brutus Ality being his undoing on several occasions.

El Halcon – The masked wrestler who has the support of the crowd, no one knows who is underneath the multi-coloured mask but El Halcon’s speed and high flying style makes her a true competitor.

The Wizard - There are rumors that he has magical powers, mostly involving Teleportation, but most suspect that it's some kind of trickery. In any case, he is considered the lead contender to go up against Duke Lundi and his "mind powers".

Tag Teams:
The Billion Dollar Couple – The current Tag Team Champions, Brian and Jessica let everyone know about their wealth and flaunt it whenever they can, not caring who hates them for it.

The Alliance – Made up of MMA fanatics Kevin and Sandra, these two are strong competitors for the tag titles as well as being in a rather strong relationship, provided it survives the challenges ahead.

The Clownz – Kootchy and Coo, the two female clowns who love to laugh and make others laugh. With a mischievous streak a mile wide, the two eagerly break the haughty and have yet to suffer for it, much to the delight of the crowd.

The Mercenaries – Hailing from Russia, Natalia and Anna are willing to attack anyone, break any rule and do any dirty work, as long as the price is there and often back up the Billion Dollar Couple.
1.title: Tickle Fight Federation

11.content:
In the TFF, there were two Championships which wrestlers on their own could hold. Earning these Championships meant that you reached the top and were the best of the best, being able to overpower the rest on a straight up battle. That is, that's what they'd normally represent, if it wasn't for the two current title holders.

For the holder of the World Championship was Duke Lundi, the Voodoo Villain from Haiti. Despite being only twenty-two, Lundi had burst onto the wrestling scene and made his way to the top in quick order, winning the World Championship within months. The secret of his success came from his ability to take control of his opponent's body, forcing them to stand still and take his punishment. Or, even worse, tickle themselves into submission. A black feather hung around his neck served as the source of his power and gave him the ability to humiliate his opponents. Few were willing to take on Lundi, but the prize for doing so, and winning, was the biggest prize in the game.

The National Championship was another such belt that had fallen to a questionable Champion. Himiko, the Ninja from deep within Japan had taken control of the belt after her dirty tricks had led her to defeating its last holder. A master of sneak attacks and deception, Himiko frequently threw smoke bombs in matches to gain an advantage, her opponents declaring that she used feathers and other forbidden tools to tickle them into submission while the smoke was raised. Without the referee seeing it though, she could never be found out and the cries of submission through the clouds was all she needed to hold onto her title.

Of course, there were other options to take. Newcomers in the TFF usually found their first victory in the form of Rebecca Ware, an enthusiastic, if clumsy foe who tripped over her own feet more often than not. With the worst win-lose record in the entire federation, she was frequently challenged by wrestlers who wanted and easy opponent to work their skills on. Something that Rebecca never really caught on too.

Alternatively, the option to simply see what other challengers there were was always open. The TFF is a big company with plenty of challengers, male and female. Why not see who can be found?

143.title: Bondage Match

1431.content: Who does Kevin face in the Bondage Stipulation Match?
1431.title: Kevin

choices: Use El Halcon's momentum against him
14312.content:
The roar of the crowd is deafening as the high flying El Halcon dashes down the ramp and leaps into the ring! He struts around the canvas for a long while, whipping the crowd to a critical mass of frenzied excitement.

You stand patiently in your corner and watch your strutting opponent for any signs of weakness, but none readily present themselves.

The match begins! El Halcon dances dexterously around the ring, swiping up a length of rope with near-imperceptible speed.

You eye the masked menace cautiously, and grab a pair of sturdy looking cuffs, holding them open and ready in your right hand.

Several feints and tumbles and grapples later, you see an opportunity when El Halcon reaches for one of your legs! You quickly slap the first cuff around his right wrist, but before you can attach the second cuff, he tumbles away, quick as lightning!

You smile wide seeing the glittering cuff dangle from your foe's right hand; you're halfway there it seems! But as you try to put a little distance between yourself and El Halcon, you stumble onto your back! Looking down you see the nimble luchador has wrapped the length of rope around your ankles. The coils are loose and unknotted, but effective enough!

Giving you just enough time to marvel at his speed and ingenuity, El Halcon dives toward you. What do you do?
14312.title: El Halcon

143121.content:
You begin rolling to your left, in an attempt to get clear of the charging El Halcon!

But mid-roll your opponent lands right on your back, knocking the wind out of you. Stunned and struggling for breath, you feel the slack go out of the rope around your ankles and instinctively reach back to free them; just what the grinning luchador wanted!

In a matter of seconds, El Halcon steps away, leaving you squirming pointlessly in a strict hogtie. The crowd erupts in cheering and whistling and your opponent eats it up.

"Ha baboso, you need a lot more practice, I think," El Halcon taunts, kneeling beside you.

The referee declares the winner, and hands El Halcon the key to the handcuffs dangling from his wrist.

"Now what do I do, eh?" El Halcon asks, dropping the unlocked cuffs to the canvas beside you. "I'd unmask you, but you wear no mask. Hmmm."

You feel the wrestler's hands on your shorts and see the crowd react excitedly as he looks to them for approval, and gets it. With a quick yank, your shorts are around your knees and your face turns a deep, embarrassing red.

"Cielos! look at that! You're so pale, it's blinding!" El Halcon jokingly squints at your bright white tan lines, eliciting jeers and laughter from the crowd. Flash bulbs pop all around, as countless cameras capture every second of your humiliation.

"Your face is such a pretty red. Maybe I can get your ass to match, eh?" The wrestler taunts, holding his open palm in the air, and looking to the crowd.
143121.title: Roll out of the way

144.content: You choose strip match which will involve stripping off your opponents clothing until they're in the nude. Who are you going to be facing?
144.title: Strip Match

145.content: How about these two op
145.title: Other

info.brief_description: A pro tickle wrestling federation complete with storylines, characters, the works.
info.description: Welcome to the Tickle Fight Federation, where true champions compete!
